Reviews.Title: GREAT ENTRY LEVEL PC
Reviews.Author: JLP
Reviews.Content: Has great features for the price.  Not the fastest processor but vey adequate for most tasks such as email, documents, web surfing.  If you want a lot of bang for the buck this is an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: A+ for Amazon
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The computer works great no problems. I will buy my next Laptop here too. This beats running all over town any day.  Mike - Boise

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't take an HP laptop for free
Reviews.Author: L. Peridot
Reviews.Content: People warned me about HP, but I bought one anyway. After the adaptor bit it, I bought an aftermarket adaptor. I could live with that, but not the persistent HP Smart Adaptor Alert that pops up on my screen every few seconds. I guess it's to annoy you into buying HP parts, but I'm just going to get another computer--not an HP.
